articles.author: Ella Joyner
articles.title: EU overcomes 'Orban fatigue,' passes €50 billion Ukraine aid - DW (English)
articles.description: The European Union has overcome Orban's resistance to a €50 billion aid package for Ukraine. On Thursday, the bloc unanimously came to an agreement. Now, both sides are celebrating the deal as a political victory.
articles.content: Frustration with Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban was palpable among European Union (EU) leaders arriving at a summit in Brussels on Thursday to discuss an aid package for Ukraine. For weeks, Or… [+5910 chars]

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
